text:
@HawleyMO How about launching an investigation into Trump's lies that #Covid19 was a Democratic hoax, that he has the virus "totally under control," that it'll miraclely disappear & his fucking dithering around for 2 months WITHOUT DOING ANYTHING? 
https://t.co/ZFpCOrQDPb

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
